comments:
WTP-M4

When creating a new Flexible Project which name ends with one or more spaces 
o a new project directory is created without the spaces
o a Wizard Error pops up with the exception below

I think this problem should be catched before by deactivating the finish button.

----------------

Charles - Can you confirm this is still an issue?

Part of a mass update. Based on 9/22/2005 development review meeting, it's 
determined this was an open bug/enhancement with tartget mistakenly set to M8. 
Since this will not be in M8, I am changing to "unspecified". 

If this is an error, please correct (for example the bug really has been fixed
in M8, change back to M8, and "fixed".)
This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP bugs which are in the resolved state without an appropriate targeted version.  If you feel this bug was closed inappropriately, please reopen.
